branchCategory.name: 90/91-CY3R, Magnetically Coupled Rodless Cylinder
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless Cylinder, magnetically coupled series 90-CY3R and 91-CY3R can be used in many diverse  environments. 90-CY3R is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-CY3R includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications. Magnetically coupled cylinders have a wide range of  applications, and save mounting space. Loads and moments are possible  through the use of integrated guides. A variety of guides can be used  to achieve the necessary accuracy or allowable moment needed for your  application. CY is available in 5 bore sizes, from 15mm to 40mm with  standard stokes up to 1000mm. </p>
